name: 曹聖豪
objective:
本課程探討 AI 在影像製作與表達上的應用，從人工智慧發展趨勢到文化與房地產案例，結合理論、講者分享與實作練習。學生將透過 AI 影像工具體驗生成圖片、影片與後製，並以專題展現創意與應用能力。

This course explores the application of artificial intelligence in image production and expression. It covers AI development trends as well as cultural and real estate case studies, combining theoretical lectures, guest speaker sessions, and hands-on practice. Students will experiment with AI tools to generate images, videos, and post-production content, and showcase their creativity and applied skills through a final project.
